comment: Mr. Matt or Macaroni as some of call him is an awesome professor for KSU Seminar. He turns a boring class into something fun. His class was one of the few I enjoyed going to! The class is easy, and he is hilarious. Sometimes your political views can clash, but he is still a chill dude!
The class is so pointless, but he tries to make it engaging and fun. Expects you to put this class first and long and boring lectures.
He made my freshmen year so amazing! I looked forward to going to his class! I made tons of friends there too! It can be a lot of work sometimes but it's easy! TAKE HIM!!
Super fun class!! I recommend taking him if you can! Tests are super easy just take notes from his power points. A few group projects but they are really easy and are a lot of fun!
He was really cool. He's young, kind of sarcastic, very enthusiastic, and very fair.
